articles.title: 'Do not do this': Thorn breaks silence over exit of Reds trio - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Queensland Reds coach says he pleaded with Izack Rodda, Isaac Lucas and Harry Hockings to remain at the club.
articles.content:
Thorn, speaking on Triple M Brisbane in his first interview since the drama started, said talk of a rift was incorrect.

articles.title: Gun Hawks mid suffers fracture to face, in doubt for R2 - Australian Football League
articles.description: Hawthorn midfielder Jaeger O'Meara has sustained a fracture to his face
articles.content:
HAWTHORN midfielder Jaeger O'Meara has escaped serious damage after a head knock sustained at training yesterday.
